item.description:
lets meet at the Gallery in Manchester on Sunday night. Sonja would like to know if some of you would like to meet her to go dancing.

The cost is $9.00 this includes DJ coffee snacks. there is a coupon in the Hartford Courant for $3.00 dollars off. casual dress no jeans no flip flops .

If you need a ride from Willimantic way contact Sonja and maybe you can carpool if coming from W. Hartford. look for a gray blue Cadillac plate number EWA449. please rsvp so she knows who she might be looking for.

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: dance
